description: A collection of circles in a large trapezoidal formation atop a large, wide rectangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a small, very pale green triangle to the left of the center of the trapezoidal formation and a bright green triangle below the center of the rectangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

user.name: VertexArchive

content: March 16, 2024. How does this stack up? #NYTVertex
